name: Herbert D. BROWN Jr., Petitioner v. Listaree M. BRICKEY and the Honorable Lisette Shirdan-Harris, Respondents

parties: Herbert D. BROWN Jr., Petitioner v. Listaree M. BRICKEY and the Honorable Lisette Shirdan-Harris, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
31 A.3d 654
Herbert D. BROWN Jr., Petitioner v. Listaree M. BRICKEY and the Honorable Lisette Shirdan-Harris, Respondents.
No. 70 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 2, 2011.
